metadata.title: /sys/storage/raft - HTTP API
metadata.description:
The `/sys/storage/raft` endpoints are used to manage Vault's Raft storage
backend.

outlineItems.title: Remove a node from raft cluster
Take a snapshot of the raft cluster
Force restore raft using a snapshot

backend.`),mdx("h2",{"id":"join-a-raft-cluster"},mdx("a",{parentName:"h2","className":"__permalink-h","href":"#join-a-raft-cluster","aria-label":"join a raft cluster permalink"},`\xbb`),`Join a raft cluster`),mdx("p",null,`This endpoint joins a new server node to the Raft cluster. When using Shamir
seal, as soon as the Vault server is brought up, this API should be invoked
instead of `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`sys/init`),`. This API completes in 2 phases. Once this is invoked,
the joining node will receive a challenge from the Raft's leader node. This
challenge can be answered by the joining node only after a successful unseal.
Hence, the joining node should be unsealed using the unseal keys of the Raft's
leader node.`),mdx("table",null,mdx("thead",{parentName:"table"},mdx("tr",{parentName:"thead"},mdx("th",{parentName:"tr","align":"left"},`Method`),mdx("th",{parentName:"tr","align":"left"},`Path`))),mdx("tbody",{parentName:"table"},mdx("tr",{parentName:"tbody"},mdx("td",{parentName:"tr","align":"left"},mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"td"},`POST`)),mdx("td",{parentName:"tr","align":"left"},mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"td"},`/sys/storage/raft/join`))))),mdx("h3",{"id":"parameters"},mdx("a",{parentName:"h3","className":"__permalink-h","href":"#parameters","aria-label":"parameters permalink"},`\xbb`),`Parameters`),mdx("ul",null,mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},mdx("a",{parentName:"li","id":"leader_api_addr","className":"__target-lic","aria-hidden":"true"}),mdx("p",{parentName:"li"},mdx("a",{parentName:"p","href":"#leader_api_addr","aria-label":"leader_api_addr permalink","className":"__permalink-lic"},mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"a"},`leader_api_addr`)),` `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`(string: <required>)`),` â€“ Address of the leader node in the

metadata.title: Vault by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Vault secures, stores, and tightly controls access to tokens, passwords, certificates, API keys, and other secrets in modern computing. Vault handles leasing, key revocation, key rolling, auditing, and provides secrets as a service through a unified API.

packageManagers.label: Ubuntu/Debian
commands: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install vault

integrationsConfig.description: A curated collection of official, partner, and community Vault plugins.

sidebarLinks.title: Tutorial: Create a custom secrets engine
